<a id="wriftai.predictions.Prediction"></a>

### *class* Prediction

Bases: `TypedDict`

Represents a prediction.

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Prediction.url"></a>

#### url *: str*

URL to access the prediction resource.

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Prediction.id"></a>

#### id *: str*

Unique identifier for the prediction.

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Prediction.created_at"></a>

#### created_at *: str*

Timestamp when the prediction was created.

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Prediction.status"></a>

#### status *: [Status](#wriftai.predictions.Status)*

Current status of the prediction.

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Prediction.updated_at"></a>

#### updated_at *: str*

Timestamp of the last update to the prediction.

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Prediction.setup_time"></a>

#### setup_time *: str | None*

Time taken to set up the prediction environment.

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Prediction.execution_time"></a>

#### execution_time *: str | None*

Time taken to execute the prediction.

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Prediction.model"></a>

#### model *: [PredictionModel](#wriftai.predictions.PredictionModel)*

The model of the prediction.

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Webhook.secret"></a>

#### validate_input *: NotRequired[bool]*

<a id="wriftai.predictions.WaitOptions"></a>

### *class* WaitOptions(poll_interval=1.0, on_poll=None)

Bases: `_BaseWaitOptions`

Options for customizing wait behaviour.

* **Parameters:**
  * **poll_interval** (*float*)
  * **on_poll** (*Callable* *[* *[*[*PredictionWithIO*](#wriftai.predictions.PredictionWithIO) *]* *,* *None* *]*  *|* *None*)

<a id="wriftai.predictions.WaitOptions.on_poll"></a>

#### on_poll *: Callable[[[PredictionWithIO](#wriftai.predictions.PredictionWithIO)], None] | None* *= None*

Optional callback that receives the latest prediction after each poll.

<a id="wriftai.predictions.AsyncWaitOptions"></a>

### *class* AsyncWaitOptions(poll_interval=1.0, on_poll=None)

Bases: `_BaseWaitOptions`

Options for customizing asynchronous wait behaviour.

* **Parameters:**
  * **poll_interval** (*float*)
  * **on_poll** (*Callable* *[* *[*[*PredictionWithIO*](#wriftai.predictions.PredictionWithIO) *]* *,* *Awaitable* *[**None**]* *]*  *|* *None*)

<a id="wriftai.predictions.AsyncWaitOptions.on_poll"></a>

#### on_poll *: Callable[[[PredictionWithIO](#wriftai.predictions.PredictionWithIO)], Awaitable[None]] | None* *= None*

Optional callback that receives the latest prediction after each poll.

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Predictions"></a>

### *class* Predictions(api)

Bases: `Resource`

Initializes the Resource with an API instance.

* **Parameters:**
  **api** ([*API*](wriftai.api.md#wriftai.api.API)) – An instance of the API class.

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Predictions.get"></a>

#### get(prediction_id)

Get a prediction by id.

* **Parameters:**
  **prediction_id** (*str*) – The unique identifier of the prediction.
* **Returns:**
  The prediction object.
* **Return type:**
  [*PredictionWithIO*](#wriftai.predictions.PredictionWithIO)

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Predictions.async_get"></a>

#### *async* async_get(prediction_id)

Get a prediction by id.

* **Parameters:**
  **prediction_id** (*str*) – The unique identifier of the prediction.
* **Returns:**
  The prediction object.
* **Return type:**
  [*PredictionWithIO*](#wriftai.predictions.PredictionWithIO)

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Predictions.list"></a>

#### list(pagination_options=None)

List predictions.

* **Parameters:**
  **pagination_options** ([*PaginationOptions*](wriftai.md#wriftai.PaginationOptions) *|* *None*) – Optional settings to control pagination behavior.
* **Returns:**
  Paginated response containing predictions and navigation metadata.
* **Return type:**
  [*PaginatedResponse*](wriftai.pagination.md#wriftai.pagination.PaginatedResponse)[[*Prediction*](#wriftai.predictions.Prediction)]

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Predictions.async_list"></a>

#### *async* async_list(pagination_options=None)

List predictions.

* **Parameters:**
  **pagination_options** ([*PaginationOptions*](wriftai.md#wriftai.PaginationOptions) *|* *None*) – Optional settings to control pagination behavior.
* **Returns:**
  Paginated response containing predictions and navigation metadata.
* **Return type:**
  [*PaginatedResponse*](wriftai.pagination.md#wriftai.pagination.PaginatedResponse)[[*Prediction*](#wriftai.predictions.Prediction)]

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Predictions.create"></a>

#### create(params, model, wait=False, wait_options=WaitOptions(poll_interval=1.0, on_poll=None))

Create a prediction.

* **Parameters:**
  * **model** (*str*) – The model reference in either owner/name or owner/name:version-number
    format (for example: deepseek-ai/deepseek-r1 or
    deepseek-ai/deepseek-r1:1).
  * **params** ([*CreatePredictionParams*](#wriftai.predictions.CreatePredictionParams)) – Prediction creation params.
  * **wait** (*bool*) – If True, waits until the prediction reaches a terminal state.
    If False, returns the prediction immediately. Defaults to False.
  * **wait_options** ([*WaitOptions*](#wriftai.predictions.WaitOptions)) – Options for customizing wait behavior. If not provided,
    default options are used.
* **Returns:**
  The new prediction.
* **Return type:**
  [*PredictionWithIO*](#wriftai.predictions.PredictionWithIO)

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Predictions.async_create"></a>

#### *async* async_create(params, model, wait=False, wait_options=AsyncWaitOptions(poll_interval=1.0, on_poll=None))

Create a prediction.

* **Parameters:**
  * **model** (*str*) – The model reference in either owner/name or owner/name:version-number
    format (for example: deepseek-ai/deepseek-r1 or
    deepseek-ai/deepseek-r1:1).
  * **params** ([*CreatePredictionParams*](#wriftai.predictions.CreatePredictionParams)) – Prediction creation params.
  * **wait** (*bool*) – If True, waits until the prediction reaches a terminal state.
    If False, returns the prediction immediately. Defaults to False.
  * **wait_options** ([*AsyncWaitOptions*](#wriftai.predictions.AsyncWaitOptions)) – Options for customizing wait behavior. If not provided,
    default options are used.
* **Returns:**
  The new prediction.
* **Return type:**
  [*PredictionWithIO*](#wriftai.predictions.PredictionWithIO)

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Predictions.wait"></a>

#### wait(predictionID, options=WaitOptions(poll_interval=1.0, on_poll=None))

Wait for a prediction to complete.

This method uses short polling to check the prediction status at
regular intervals until it reaches a terminal state. It blocks
execution and waits until the prediction has finished processing.

* **Parameters:**
  * **predictionID** (*str*) – Unique identifier of the prediction.
  * **options** ([*WaitOptions*](#wriftai.predictions.WaitOptions)) – Options for customizing wait behavior. If not provided,
    default options are used.
* **Returns:**
  Prediction after completion.
* **Return type:**
  [*PredictionWithIO*](#wriftai.predictions.PredictionWithIO)

<a id="wriftai.predictions.Predictions.async_wait"></a>

#### *async* async_wait(predictionID, options=AsyncWaitOptions(poll_interval=1.0, on_poll=None))

Wait for a prediction to complete.

This method uses short polling to check the prediction status at
regular intervals until it reaches a terminal state. It blocks
execution and waits until the prediction has finished processing.

* **Parameters:**
  * **predictionID** (*str*) – Unique identifier of the prediction.
  * **options** ([*AsyncWaitOptions*](#wriftai.predictions.AsyncWaitOptions)) – Options for customizing wait behavior. If not provided,
    default options are used.
* **Returns:**
  Prediction after completion.
* **Return type:**
  [*PredictionWithIO*](#wriftai.predictions.PredictionWithIO)
